mapper.select: select user_no, user_date, delete_YN ,REGEXP_REPLACE(user_id, '.', '*', 4) as user_id ,REGEXP_REPLACE(user_name, '[[:print:]]{1}', '*', 2, 1) as user_name ,REGEXP_REPLACE(user_tel, '(\d{3})\-(\d{3,4})\-(\d{4})','\1-****-\3') as user_tel ,concat('****',substr(user_email, 4, length(user_email))) as user_email from ( select /*+ index_desc(kap_user PK_KAP_USER) */ rownum as rnum, user_no, user_id, user_name, user_email, user_tel, user_date, delete_YN from kap_user where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rnum > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.update: update kap_user set delete_YN = 'Y', user_date=sysdate where user_no = #{user_no} and delete_YN = 'N'
